summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CrucibAI landing page redesign. Most features working excellently with successful light theme implementation on auth page. AI chat functional with real responses. Minor theme inconsistency on landing page body background needs fixing.

ui_bugs.issue: Body background still dark (rgb(8,8,8)) instead of white - incomplete light theme implementation
Mobile menu links have visibility issues when navigating to sections

design_issues.issue: Body background should be white to match Emergent's clean light aesthetic - currently only main container is white

passed_tests: Landing page hero section with clean typography
AI Chat box sends and receives real messages
Features section displays 'What can CrucibAI do for you?'
Pricing section shows 3 plans (Free, Standard, Pro)
Navigation links scroll to correct sections (Features, Pricing, FAQs)
Auth page has proper light design theme

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (14/16 tests passed - theme and mobile nav issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix landing page body background color to white (currently rgb(8,8,8)) to complete light theme implementation. The main container is already white, but body background needs to match. Also fix mobile menu navigation visibility issues.
